name: Shine Servers
tag_list: shineservers, shineservers-com, webhosting, dedicated-servers, virtual-private-servers, shared-hosting, reseller-hosting
overview:
Started in 2011 with an aim to provide a comprehensive range of secure web hosting services; Shine Servers LLP proudly serves more than 1000 satisfied customers at present. You can read some of our customer testimonials here. Located in New Delhi, India and serving the whole world, we have an overall experience of five years in the web hosting industry. Shine Servers LLP was found by Bharat Vashist after he was tired of seeing hosting companies not delivering what they promised to its customers. Quality and Customer Service is our stronghold and one can be assured about the quality of our service and servers. We are passionate about Customer Service and hence all our services are fully managed by us, at no extra cost – you don’t have to worry about your servers; it is our job.

Some of our awesome and fully managed services are:

Shared Web Hosting Reseller Web Hosting Virtual Private Servers Budget Dedicated Servers Single Processor Servers Dual Processor Multi-core Servers

All Shared and VPS servers are located at Dataplace Datacenter in Netherlands using the Global Layer Network. All equipments including servers of ShineServers LLP are placed in a private corridor inside the Dataplace DC. Our network consists of the best connections like AMS-IX, DECIX, L-INX, Tinet, NTT, Telia and Level3. Global Layer has multiple POPs (Point of Presences) to guarantee a very high network uptime to us. We understand that every minute down is a minute too much.
